channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 18:30 Driven anxiety in the Kiev region. Further in further messages.
item.description: 游릭 18:30 Driven anxiety in the Kiev region. Further in further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.description: 游리 16:23 Flashing anxiety in Kharkiv Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv District-Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv_.
